mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "dkContract.id", a.service_date AS "serviceDate", a.service_person AS "servicePerson", a.review_status AS "reviewStatus", a.review_by AS "reviewBy", a.is_review AS "isReview", a.service_content AS "serviceContent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", dkContract.name AS "dkContract.name"
